ADLMVPUCaps Struct Reference

Structure containing information about MultiVPU capabilities. More...

Data Fields

int iSize
 Must be set to sizeof( ADLMVPUCaps ).
int iAdapterCount
 Number of adapters.
int iPossibleMVPUMasters
 Bits set for all possible MVPU masters. MVPU_ADAPTER_0 .. MVPU_ADAPTER_3.
int iPossibleMVPUSlaves
 Bits set for all possible MVPU slaves. MVPU_ADAPTER_0 .. MVPU_ADAPTER_3.
char cAdapterPath [4][256]
 Registry path for each adapter.

Detailed Description

Structure containing information about MultiVPU capabilities.

This structure is used to store information about MultiVPU capabilities. This structure is used by the ADL_Display_MVPUCaps_Get() function.

Field Documentation

int ADLMVPUCaps::iSize

Must be set to sizeof( ADLMVPUCaps ).

int ADLMVPUCaps::iAdapterCount

Number of adapters.

int ADLMVPUCaps::iPossibleMVPUMasters

Bits set for all possible MVPU masters. MVPU_ADAPTER_0 .. MVPU_ADAPTER_3.

int ADLMVPUCaps::iPossibleMVPUSlaves

Bits set for all possible MVPU slaves. MVPU_ADAPTER_0 .. MVPU_ADAPTER_3.

char ADLMVPUCaps::cAdapterPath[4][256]

Registry path for each adapter.
